main.controllers

Class EventController

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.controllers.EventController

  • public class EventController
extends java.lang.Object
    The EventController handles event management: create and cancel an event; add or remove a user from the attendee list; organize the speaker; as well as a getter for the current schedule of a User.
    Since:
    2020-11-08
    Version:
    5.1
    Author:
    Zewen Ma

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EventController(ProgramController programController)
      Default constructor for an EventsController.
